name: Mageling: Arcana
description:
~CREATED IN 72 HOURS FOR LUDUM DARE 52~

W-A-S-D to move

1 to start casting a spell, left mouse to cast it

# NOTE: This requires two people to play at the same time, unfortunately we ran out of time and couldnt make a local mode. Sorry if you aren't able to try it!

Hey there! We started this jam with big dreams and ended up with about 1/10 of what we imagined. We decided to still release what we had just for fun but consider lowering your expectations! If you like what you see, maybe check back in later. We enjoyed making what we've got so far and are planning on expanding this idea with more magic and some stuff we had to cut for time, like a rounds system. Thanks for reading and stay fergielious.

~CREDITS ~

Programming--NickHaldon

Art--GizzardWizzard/Kolbe Shomette
